name: AP Harvester
description: An open and collaborative data collection tool developed by the Associated Press

HARVESTER_LOGO.description: URL to logo to display at the top of the page (default is the AP logo)

HARVESTER_CONFIG_RESOURCE_ID.description: Google Sheet that will configure custom URLs for Harvester

GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS.description: File containing Google service account credentials

GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: Google OAuth client ID (leave empty to disable auth)

GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Google OAuth client secret (leave empty to disable auth)

JWT_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
